name: Crazy Park
description:
A 3D fast-paced platformer where the player will have to race against time and complete their tasks as Park Manager.

Get letter grade scores for your performance!

Save your best times to the Leaderboard!

Unlock different outfits and hats by getting the best scores!

Crazy Park is still on its early access stage and we are listening to the players feedback to help us make the game better.

 So, if you played our game, please take a minute of your time to fill out this form. We would really  appreciate it.         https://forms.gle/mmnAXpwApwaou3CQ7
